scripts.start:server: concurrently "npm run cache:clear" "npm run route:clear"  "php artisan serve"
scripts.install:packages: concurrently "cd sss-archiving-mservice && npm install" "cd client && npm install"
scripts.start:app: concurrently "npm run cache:clear" "npm run route:clear"  "npm run start:server" "cd sss-archiving-mservice && npm run start:server" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.clear:cache: php artisan cache:clear && php artisan route:clear
